subject: Labour in the Lords Vineyard
body:
Dear Beloved,
It is by the grace of God that I have received Christ, having known the
truth; I had nochoice than to do what is righteous and just in the sight of God for
eternal life and in the  sight of man for witness of God & His Mercies 
and glory upon my life.
I am Mrs. Hannah Jack Williams, the widow of Mr. Sam Gilbert. My 
husband worked with the Chevron/Texaco for twenty years in Russia,
Africa and the Middle East before he died in the year 2003. We were 
married for ten years without a child. My Husband died after a brief 
illness that lasted for only four days. Before his death we both got
born-again as dedicated Christians. Since his death I decided not
to re-marry or bother to get a child outside my matrimonial home which
 the Bible is strongly against.
Presently, I'm in a hospital in Germany where I have been undergoing
treatment for esophageal cancer. I am scheduled to undergo a major
operation in a few days time even though my doctors have told me that I 
have only a few weeks to live.
After the death of my husband, i deposited the sum of $3.5 Million 
(Three Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars) with an investment firm in 
Europe.It is my last wish to see this money distributed to charity 
organizations and NGO anywhere in the World in helping human race.
Because relatives and friends have plundered so much of my wealth since 
my illness, I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge
responsibility to any of them. Please, I beg you in the name of God to 
help me complete my work in the Lord's Vineyard. I need you to 
Stand-in as my beneficiary and administer to the funds, doing the work of the lord.
I want a person that is God-fearing who will use this money to fund 
churches, orphanages and widows propagating the word of God and to 
ensure that the house of God is maintained. The Bible made us to understand 
that blessed is the hand that giveth.
I know that I am going to be in the bosom of the Lord. Exodus 14 VS 14: 
says that the Lord will fight my case and I shall hold my peace.
If you can do this, i shall communicate with my attorney immediately 
and have him place you as the beneficiary of the funds.
I await your quick response to this mail as this is my last wish to see 
these funds transferred before my Death.
Please my beloved for further communication on how we are going to
conclude this, reach me on my private mail: williamshanj@gmail.com 
Remain Blessed
Your Sister in Christ,
Mrs. Hannah J. Williams.
